message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_DESCRIPTOR_FV_EVIDENCE_TYPE_EMPTY
message.locale: The evidence type must be specified.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_DESCRIPTOR_FV_RECEIVED_DATE_IN_FUTURE
message.locale: The received date cannot be later than the current date.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_DESCRIPTOR_FV_RECEIVED_DATE_NULL
message.locale: The received date must be entered.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_DESCRIPTOR_FV_CASEID_PARTICIPANTID_EMPTY
message.locale: For Participant evidence a caseID or participantID must be specified.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_DESCRIPTOR_MRE_CORRECTIONSETID_STATUS
message.locale: Multiple evidence descriptor records exist with correctionSetID '%1s' and status code '%2c'.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_DESCRIPTOR_FV_CHANGE_RECEIVED_DATE_IN_FUTURE
message.locale: The change received date cannot be later than the current date.

message.name: ERR_EVIDENCE_DESCRIPTOR_XRV_CHANGE_RECEIVED_DATE_EARLIER_THAN_RECEVIED_DATE
message.locale: The change received date must not be earlier than the received date.
